# Objective of Exploratory Graphic Data Analysis #

This Project deals with loading the data from source and exploring using various graphic techniques. The source of the data is from  "UC Irvine Machine Learning Repository" , a popular repository for machine learning datasets. 
In particular, we will be using the "Individual household electric power consumption Data Set".

## Basic steps or pre-requisite for this project ##
* Set the working directory.
* Check your current graphic device using dev.cur() and make sure it is set to the current display screen.
* No need to import any library.

## Starting with the project ##  
* Run plot1.R,plot2.R,plot3.R and plot4.R step-by-step separately.
* Respective png files gets generated into your local file system in the same respective name of the file.
